doc.previous: Other agricultural industries have been less successful Sugarcane production originally established by Germans in the early 20th century could be successful Old train tracks for transporting cane can be seen at some plantations east of Apia Pineapples grow well in Samoa but beyond local consumption have not been a major export
doc.after: Samoa has a population of 194 320 About three quarters of the population live on the main island of Upolu 44
